category-def.name: Eclipse Java 8 Support (for Kepler SR2)
category-def.label: Eclipse Java 8 Support (for Kepler SR2)
category-def.description: Eclipse Java 8 Support (for Kepler SR2) - This repository provides features patches for Kepler SR2 that enable development with Java 8. It is intended only for Kepler SR2, and if used on other versions or streams, may cause bundles to be down-leveled or up-leveled.
